tool.name: Association of points
tool.description: in consecutive frames (slices) using the nearest neighbor algorithm

param.name: fn_in
param.label: Coordinates (and intensities) of input points (tsv tabular)

param.name: nbpx
param.label: Neighborhood size (in pixel) for associating points

param.name: thres
param.label: Tracks with all intensities lower than certain percentage (%) of the global maximal intensity will be discarded

param.name: minlen
param.label: Minimum length of tracks (% of sequence length)

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool associates points in consecutive frames (slices) using the nearest neighbor algorithm.
